Uses of Class
logic.workstation.Task

  • Packages that use Task 
    Package Description
    logic.car  
    logic.users  
    logic.workstation  

    • Uses of Task in logic.car

      Methods in logic.car that return types with arguments of type Task 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Task> CarOrder.getTasks()
      Returns the list of tasks that need to be completed to complete this car order.

    • Uses of Task in logic.users

      Methods in logic.users that return types with arguments of type Task 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Task> Mechanic.getAvailableTasks()
      Returns the list of tasks that need to be performed at the active workstation or null if the mechanic has no active workstation.
      Methods in logic.users with parameters of type Task 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Mechanic.doTask(Task task)
      Performs a task if the task is compatible with the active workstation of the mechanic.

    • Uses of Task in logic.workstation

      Methods in logic.workstation that return types with arguments of type Task 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Task> Workstation.getRequiredTasks()
      Returns the list of tasks from the current order that can be performed on this workstation.
      Methods in logic.workstation with parameters of type Task 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Workstation.doTask(Task task)
      Executes a given task if the task is compatible with this workstation.
      boolean Workstation.isCompatibleTask(Task task)
      Checks whether the given task can be performed on this workstation.
